channel.title: [Failed to register tell a dev]
channel.description:
I just bought the game on steam and whenever i enter an email i get the message [Failed to register tell a dev!].
I assume this is to verify the game so now im not able to play it
I click on the one time steam login ingame and then i get to royal registration enter my email and get said message. A friend who just bought it got the same problem
I tried to search for other people with the same problem but beside my friend i can't find any, I do hope i can actually play the game i paid for.

item.title: [Failed to register tell a dev]
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
So I assume that means you’re fine now?

Read full topic

item.title: [Failed to register tell a dev]

item.description:
It seemed to have fixed itself.

Read full topic

welp, just tell a dev in discord.
